column4: I have this file on my desktop wine-door.tar.gz, how can i install it as a program... I am trying hard to get it right
usually, in a terminal @ that dir, type     ./configure    then type    make    then do a     sudo make install       provided the file is extracted and its dependencies are in place..... =)
extract the file, then enter the extracted folders directory in a terminal (cd /path/to/extract) then ./configure, make, sudo make install

ms word works good on wine alone, once install in a terminal    wine /path/to/msoffice.exe   or whatever.... Virtual machine of winblows even better or you have no winblowsto install? I know where MS Word runs best :P
terninal = df -h  or applications/accessories has a disk usage app
